meanings.sent1: The anaglyphic glasses made the movie look different.
meanings.sent2: The anaglyphic effect added depth to the image.
meanings.sent3: The anaglyphic artwork made the room seem more colorful.
meanings.sent4: Her anaglyphic painting seemed to jump off the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyphic design was both fascinating and puzzling.

meanings.definition: A three-dimensional image produced by superimposing two pictures taken from slightly different angles.
meanings.sent1: The anaglyphic displayed on the screen seemed to pop out.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed looking at the anaglyphic of the city skyline.
meanings.sent3: The anaglyphic of the cat made it look like it was coming out of the screen.
meanings.sent4: The anaglyphic of the mountains gave a sense of depth to the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The anaglyphic image made me feel like I could reach out and touch it.
